data.title: Services - Orthopedics of Illinois
data.meta_description: Orthopedics of Illinois - Bloomington, IL, Normal, IL and Champaign, IL
data.text:
Orthopedics of Illinois™ offers a complete range of pediatric and adult orthopedic services, including treatment for sports injuries; job-related injuries; arthritis; joint replacement; bone fracture; and muscle, tendon and nerve damage. Dr. Edward Kolb MD is Board Certified by the American Board of Orthopaedic Surgery, and our clinical team of physician assistants, nurses, technologists, trainers and therapists all hold certifications and/or college degrees in their area of responsibility.

At Orthopedics of Illinois™, our experienced and licensed therapists all hold doctoral degrees in physical or occupational therapy, a staffing model not found at any other facility in the area. OrthoIL™ guarantees individualized treatment plans from a Doctor of Physical or Occupational therapy for all referring patients. After undergoing a thorough evaluation, your treatment plan is developed by you, your physician and your therapist. Superior physical and occupational therapy services, in association with comprehensive patient education and post therapy support, assist to shorten your recovery time and to ensure optimum outcomes.

Orthopedics of Illinois™ also offers Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) within its facility to provide the highest quality of patient care and convenience. Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) uses a strong magnetic field unlike x-rays, which emit radiation to provide detailed pictures of internal organs and tissues. MRI provides clear pictures of soft-tissue structures near and around bones. It can help provide a quick and more accurate diagnosis for your physician which in some situations can reduce the need for exploratory surgery and other diagnostic procedures which might have associated risk

Practice Online

We maintain information on our website including rehab exercise instructions. You can visit us at www.orthoIL.com. We invite our patients to become fans of OrthoIL™ on Facebook.

Normal Office

Our Normal office is located at The Center for Health, 2200 Fort Jesse Rd., Suite 250. The office is open Monday through Friday from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Our phone number is 309-268-0000. Our fax number is 309-863-5923

Champaign Office

Our office at 2110 Fox Drive, Champaign, IL 61820. The office is open Monday through Friday from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Our phone number is 217-366-1237. Our fax number is 217-366-5382.

Hospitals

Our physicians are members of the medical staff at the following area hospitals: Advocate BroMenn Medical Center in Normal, OSF St. Joseph Medical Center in Bloomington, Carle Foundation Hospital in Urbana, Provena Covenant Medical Center in Urbana; and at three surgery centers: Eastland SurgiCenter in Bloomington, Bloomington-Normal Healthcare Surgery Center in Normal, and Ireland Grove Center for Surgery in Bloomington.

Insurance

We participate in most major health insurance plans, including Blue Cross, CPHP, Coventry, Health Alliance Medical Plan, HealthLink, Humana, Medicare, Multiplan, and United Healthcare. Please check with us if you are unsure if we are providers for your plan.
